blue.name: Blue Buffalo
blue.scrape_details: Based on their robots.txt, they don't seem to allow scraping of the product listing pages.

carna4.name: Carna4
carna4.scrape_details: Seems totes ok! They only have 2 cat products and their site is just a table so this would def need to be updated later.

lucy.name: Lucy Pet Products
lucy.scrape_details: It's a little murky. Going by the robots.txt it seems all ok, but the TOC are kinda unclear and I'd err on the side of caution unless I email them directly and get a goahead. They have 2 dry foods (https://www.lucypetproducts.com/pet-food-cats/) and 4 wet foods (https://www.lucypetproducts.com/cat-food-wet/)

nulo.name: Nulo Pet Food
nulo.scrape_details: Can't find any TOCs, but based on the robots.txt it looks like they're cool with it as long as we don't sort by or do any querying.

nutrish.name: Rachael Ray™ Nutrish
nutrish.scrape_details: Empty robots.txt. Looks like I can scrape https://www.nutrish.com/cat for all their cat products!

open_nature.name: Open Nature
open_nature.scrape_details: It's hard to figure out. Open Nature is a store brand owned by Albertsons(?) which owns a bunch of other chains like Safeway and Vons. Open Nature makes a lot of non pet-related products and they don't have a website for the label itself so I'm not really sure where to find a relevant TOC. Presumably I could scrape it by scraping the listings on Safeway or Albertsons' website. Some helpful links for Albertson store brands: • https://www.acmemarkets.com/shop/aisles/pet-care/cat-care.2977.html?page=1&sort=&brand=Value%20Corner~Signature%20SELECT~Signature%20Pet%20Care~Open%20Nature • https://www.pavilions.com/shop/aisles/pet-care/cat-care.2739.html?page=1&sort=&brand=Signature%20SELECT~Signature%20Pet%20Care~Open%20Nature • https://www.safeway.com/shop/aisles/pet-care/cat-care.3132.html?page=1&sort=&brand=Value%20Corner~Signature%20Pet%20Care~Open%20Nature • https://www.albertsons.com/shop/search-results.html?sort=&brand=Signature%20SELECT~Signature%20Pet%20Care~Open%20Nature&aisleName=Cat%20Care%7C1_22_2

pet_pride.name: Pet Pride™
pet_pride.scrape_details: It's a Kroger brand so scraping is gonna be really similar to abound and luvsome and other store-brands like open nature.

reveal.name: Reveal Pet Food
reveal.scrape_details: Cannot scrape the site to find all product listings if using query parameters, but you can scrape individual product pages and also the full product listing page.
